subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Ernie Els won his seventh HSBC World Match Play Championship title by beating Ángel Cabrera, 6 and 4, in Virginia Water, England. Els took the lead on the first hole and he stayed in front all day to claim his first win of the year.
snippet: Ernie Els won his seventh HSBC World Match Play Championship title by beating Ángel Cabrera, 6 and 4, in Virginia Water, England. Els took the lead on the first hole and he stayed in front all day to claim his first win of the year.
